BIO

Highly motivated AI & Machine Learning Engineer with a passion for solving complex problems using innovative technologies. Skilled in developing machine learning algorithms, deep learning models, and data analysis solutions. Proficient in Python, Java, and C++, with hands-on experience in TensorFlow and Keras. Good academic background in AI and ML, complemented by real-world projects in image recognition, and predictive analytics. Effective communicator and team player committed to continuous learning and staying up-to-date with advancements in the field.
